name: Global Summit on oncology and radiation therapy
content: Oncology and Radiation Therapy is a branch of life science that includes various research areas such as blood disorders, sorts of cancers, research on oncology and many others. This Conference will witness a conglomeration of various sub topics of Oncology and Radiation Therapy as it involves a vast range of medical streams within it. This conference will be an excellent platform for interdisciplinary interactions, to exchange and share knowledge under a single roof. The organizing committee is gearing up for an exciting and informative conference program including plenary lectures, symposia, and workshop on a various topics, poster presentations and various programs for participants from all over the world. We invite you to join us at the Oncology and Radiation Therapy-2017, where you will be sure to have a meaningful experience with researchers from all around the world.
